Total Tax Amount differs from Prestashop

The tax amount computed in OpenERP doesn't match with the tax amount in Prestashop.
Cause: The taxes are probably different between OpenERP and Magento. A fiscal position could have changed the final price.
Resolution: Check your taxes and fiscal positions configuration and correct them if necessary.
